text: :birthday: :birthday-parrot: A huge and heartfelt *HAPPY BIRTHDAY* to the one and only <@U03AKL6Q1B2> - you do so much for the entire HubSpot community and we're so lucky to have your insights, contributions and empathetic approach to building on HubSpot! Hope you have a wonderful birthday! :yay: :thanku:
Thank you so much <@UQNEXHW14> :orange_heart: I'm so grateful to be part of the dev community here, I've learned so much through the Q&A and owe a lot of gratitude to so many others! :raised_hands:
Happy birthday Jenny! You're awesome, learned so much from just watching you help other devs
Thank you Carter, I owe lots of gratitude to you as well! You're an incredible dev :clap::clap::clap:
hahaha, no no no that's not how this works, it's your birthday!
